description: Try our easy to follow Hot Cross Bun Pull-Apart Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot cross buns,Ham,High protein,Low sugar,Easter leftovers,Easter
name: Hot Cross Bun Pull-Apart Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 170Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
From the top, slice buns on a diagonal at 2cm intervals, stopping half way down. Repeat on the opposite diagonal to create a criss-cross pattern.
Using a teaspoon, lightly coat the insides of each slice with pasta sauce.
Fill each slice with ham and cheese. Sprinkle over dried herbs and transfer to prepared tray. Bake for 6 minutes or until buns are toasted and cheese has melted and turned golden.
Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly before serving.
